articles.content: Google is kicking off the new year with a fresh version of the Chrome browser. Chrome 109—releasing on January 10, 2023—includes a new Secure Payment Confirmation for Android, Material You support on… [+3759 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Dinsdale
articles.title: Several Forza Horizon Developers Leave Playground Games and Xbox to Form New Studio - IGN
articles.description: Several developers from Xbox's Forza Horizon developer Playground Games have left the company to form a new studio, Maverick Games.
articles.content:
Several developers from Xbox's Forza Horizon developer Playground Games have left the company to form a new studio, Maverick Games.
